titles.title: To establish a grant program to map optimal locations for electric vehicle charging stations and the derived demand for electricity, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Electric Vehicle Mobility Area Planning Act or the EV MAP Act
This bill requires the Department of Energy to establish a grant program to assist electric utilities and other eligible entities in identifying locations for electric vehicle charging stations to meet the needs of electric vehicle drivers.
